EmailTemplate.subject: Welcome to KenmoreDirect.com - customer registration
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Welcome {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName}
An account has been created for you www.kenmoredirect.com. You will now receive a copy of the order confirmation email when this customer places an order on the web.
Please see below for details of the registration.
Account Name: {!Account.Name} UserID / Email: {!Contact.Email}
1. Go to www.kenmoredirect.com. 2. select Sign In at the top of the page 3. enter your email address and select Password Assistance
A confirmation e-mail will be sent to you and allow you to confirm your account. The confirmation is good for 24-hours (repeat steps above after that time)
Thank you for choosing Kenmore Direct
